name: Teriyaki Flank Steak
author: KENT SULLIVAN
summary: This marinated, grilled teriyaki flank steak goes great with broccoli and rice.
ingredients: ¼ cup grated fresh ginger root
directions: In a large resealable plastic bag, mix the wine, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, and pepper
Place steak in the bag, seal, and refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat
Remove steaks from the bag, and discard marinade
Place steaks on the grill and cook 6 to 8 minutes per side, to your desired degree of doneness
The internal temperature should be at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C) for rare
Allow the steaks to sit about 5 minutes before slicing against the grain, and serving
